                                                                 int offset,
                                                                 java.lang.String sortBy,
                                                                 java.lang.String sortAs,
                                                                 boolean onlyLatest,
                                                                 PdmsDocumentSearchVO searchvo)
        Method to search documents by input argument documentIds
        Parameters:
        documentIds - List of documentids (java.util.List)
        limit - the limit
        offset - the offset
        sortBy - sory by option like document name, effective date etc.
        sortAs - sort as option like ascending or descending
        onlyLatest - current production documents or/and older version documents
        searchvo - searchvo with the search filter criteria (com.metricstream.pdms.search.model.PdmsDocumentSearchVO)
        Returns:
        the pdms document search result as instance of com.metricstream.pdms.search.model.PdmsDocumentSearchResult
